hooks.message: Code modified. Consider: (1) Run tests: npm test (2) Check types: npx tsc --noEmit (3) Use /review for quality check
Tests executed. If failures: analyze → fix → re-run. If passing: consider /refactor for code quality improvements.

Node.js TDD Plugin active. Available commands: /tdd (full cycle), /red (design tests), /green (implement), /refactor (improve), /review (analyze). Core principles: TDD, SOLID, Clean Code, Functional Patterns.
Review complete. Check quality scores against targets: SOLID 90%, Clean Code 90%, Tests 90%, TS/Functional 95%.
Test failure detected. Analyze failure reason, implement fix, verify with npm test.
